name: A trip in time
description:
You are a young scientist that is working for an evil corporation who are building a time machine to take over the world! Whilst trying to stop the company you end up going through a portal in time and must try and make your way back, collecting materials and components to repair the time machine.

The Rules: 

Seeings as this is a platformer, you are going to need to move and jump through the level to the portals at the end, make sure to read the text that is available throughout the levels! (Personally I think there is some great content... Super unbiased opinion...)

Collect the different items (Materials) throughout the game to score points, make sure to collect as much as possible as there is a high score table at the end of the game!

The controls for the game are:

"A" or "left arrow" to move left 

"D" or "right arrow" to move right

"SPACE" to jump and hold "SPACE" to jump higher
